languages.text: "Джай Хейдари, грамота наградила тебя не только безграничными возможностями, но и обязательствами перед Империумом. Она не может попасть в руки к Фалько, и ты это знаешь".

traits.locale_text: "Джай Хейдари, грамота наградила тебя не только безграничными возможностями, но и обязательствами перед Империумом. Она не может попасть в руки к Фалько, и ты это знаешь".

languages.text: "Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."
languages.original_text: "Джай Хейдари, грамота наградила тебя не только безграничными возможностями, но и обязательствами перед Империумом. Она не может попасть в руки к Фалько, и ты это знаешь".

traits.locale_text: "Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

"Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

"Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

"Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

"Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

languages.text: 「ジェイ・ヘイダリ、この証明書はお前に無限の機会を与えただけでなく、帝国に対する責任も課した。証明書がファルコの手に渡ることは許されない…わかっているはずだな」
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

traits.locale_text: 「ジェイ・ヘイダリ、この証明書はお前に無限の機会を与えただけでなく、帝国に対する責任も課した。証明書がファルコの手に渡ることは許されない…わかっているはずだな」

languages.text: “婕伊·海达利，那张执照不仅赐予了你无穷无尽的机会，也同样赋予了你对帝国的职责。它决不能落入法尔科手中，这一点你很清楚。”
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

traits.locale_text: “婕伊·海达利，那张执照不仅赐予了你无穷无尽的机会，也同样赋予了你对帝国的职责。它决不能落入法尔科手中，这一点你很清楚。”

languages.text: «Jae Heydari, el certificado no solo le abre una puerta de oportunidades, sino que también le impone unas responsabilidades para con el Imperium. Es usted plenamente consciente de que no puede caer en manos de Falco».
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

traits.locale_text: «Jae Heydari, el certificado no solo le abre una puerta de oportunidades, sino que también le impone unas responsabilidades para con el Imperium. Es usted plenamente consciente de que no puede caer en manos de Falco».

languages.text: « Jae Heydari, ce certificat vous octroie des opportunités sans égales, mais il vous impose également des devoirs envers l'Imperium. Il ne peut pas tomber entre les mains de Falco. Vous le savez. »
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

traits.locale_text: « Jae Heydari, ce certificat vous octroie des opportunités sans égales, mais il vous impose également des devoirs envers l'Imperium. Il ne peut pas tomber entre les mains de Falco. Vous le savez. »

languages.text: "Jae Heydari, das Zertifikat gewährte Euch nicht nur endlose Möglichkeiten, sondern übertrug Euch auch Verantwortung gegenüber dem Imperium. Das Zertifikat darf nicht in Falcos Hände fallen – und das wisst Ihr."
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

traits.locale_text: "Jae Heydari, das Zertifikat gewährte Euch nicht nur endlose Möglichkeiten, sondern übertrug Euch auch Verantwortung gegenüber dem Imperium. Das Zertifikat darf nicht in Falcos Hände fallen – und das wisst Ihr."

languages.text: "Jae Heydari. Tasdikname sana sınırsız imkân sunmanın yanında seni İmparatorluk'a karşı bazı yükümlülüklere de tabi tutuyor. Tasdikname, Falco'nun eline geçemez... Bunu sen de biliyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, the certificate did not only grant you limitless opportunities, it also imposed upon you responsibilities to the Imperium. The certificate cannot be allowed to fall into Falco's hands — you know this."

traits.locale_text: "Jae Heydari. Tasdikname sana sınırsız imkân sunmanın yanında seni İmparatorluk'a karşı bazı yükümlülüklere de tabi tutuyor. Tasdikname, Falco'nun eline geçemez... Bunu sen de biliyorsun."
